title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models with async/await.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compat).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models idiomatically.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering on top of ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Ready-to-run Streamlit chat app for Ollama with session memory, token usage stats, and Docker image.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; generate, chat, embeddings, list models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Official Zig client library for Ollama; minimal dependencies, allocator-aware, cross-platform.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, and dependency injection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, autoscaling, and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp index for local question-answering.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to servers with slash commands, moderation, and thread support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; zero native deps, ESM & CommonJS builds.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client; supports sync/async, embeddings, and model ops.
